title: The Block's jealous Tess and Luke reveal what they REALLY think of Mitch and Mark's house
text:
They broke down after they were told that they needed to sell their house unfinished at the auction.

And on Tuesday, the ongoing feud between Tess and Luke and Mitch and Mark continued as the duo revealed what they really think of the gay grandad's styling.

Talking to Coffs Coast's Hit105.5's A.B & Ben Luke, revealed that they actually find their competition's styling 'tacky' and feel it will quickly be outdated.

He said: 'The tackiness of house one will definitely wash off within the next few weeks, so good luck with the auction.'

The reality star went on to say that after the next season of the block, their K-mart inspired furniture will have a whole new range.

On Thursday's episode of the show Tess broke down in tears after host Scott Cam told her and Luke that they have no money left to completely finish their build.

'It's tacky': The Block's jealous Tess Cattana (L) and Luke Struber (R) revealed what they REALLY think of Mitch and Mark's styling

The pair only have enough to plaster their house to get it to auction, and were told they can't get any other tradesmen in and would need to sell their house unfinished.

'I just don't want to do this anymore Luke, I don't think I can,' Tess said through tears.

Luke tried to console his wife, telling her that they can keep going until the money runs out, but Tess reminded him that it already has.

'This is it,' she said.

Shock: The pair only have enough to plaster their house to get it to auction, and were told they can't get any other tradesmen in and would need to sell their house unfinished

Their rivals Mitch and Mark heard the news and took a swipe.

'You have to own it,' Mitch said.

'If some can make it and some can't, it means it was possible. You have to own your own destiny.'
description: They broke down after they were told that they needed to sell their house unfinished at the auction.
authors: Chloe Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
